p: Twenty-two (39.2%, n = 56) patients were positive for COVID-19 antibody. Over half (36, 62.1%) of these patients presented a high erythrocyte sedimentation rate and one-third had low pre-albumin (19, 32.8%) level. Approximately one-fourth presented with a mild increase in prothrombin time (17, 29.3%), fibrinogen (16, 27.6%), and D-dimer (12, 20.7%) and lower CD 4+ T cell counts (13, 22.4%).
